member.name: T:Qhta.WPF.Behaviors.CollectionViewBehavior
member.summary: Defines to help establish synchronized binding between CollectionView and Collection which has thread-safe operations.

member.name: M:Qhta.WPF.Behaviors.CollectionViewBehavior.EnableCollectionSynchronizationPropertyChangedCallback(System.Windows.DependencyObject,System.Windows.DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs)
member.summary: Callback method invoked on Items control.

member.name: T:Qhta.WPF.Behaviors.DispatcherBridge
member.summary: A class that implements in WPF applications

member.name: M:Qhta.WPF.Behaviors.DispatcherBridge.BeginInvoke(System.Delegate)
member.summary: Executes the specified delegate asynchronously on the thread that the System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher was created on.
member.param: The delegate to a method that takes parameters specified in args, which is pushed onto the Dispatcher event queue.

member.name: M:Qhta.WPF.Behaviors.DispatcherBridge.BeginInvoke(System.Delegate,System.Object)
member.summary: Executes the specified delegate asynchronously on the thread that the Dispatcher was created on.
member.param: The delegate to a method that takes parameters specified in args, which is pushed onto the Dispatcher event queue.
An array of objects to pass as arguments to the given method.

member.name: M:Qhta.WPF.Behaviors.DispatcherBridge.BeginInvoke(System.Delegate,System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: Executes the specified delegate asynchronously on the thread that the Dispatcher was created on.
member.param: The delegate to a method that takes parameters specified in args, which is pushed onto the Dispatcher event queue.
Sender object to pass as the first argument to the given method
An array of objects to pass as arguments to the given method.

member.name: M:Qhta.WPF.Behaviors.DispatcherBridge.Invoke(System.Delegate)
member.summary: Executes the specified delegate synchronously on the thread the Dispatcher is associated with.
member.param: A delegate to a method that takes parameters specified in args, which is pushed onto the Dispatcher event queue.
member.returns: The return value from the delegate being invoked or null if the delegate has no return value

member.name: M:Qhta.WPF.Behaviors.DispatcherBridge.Invoke(System.Delegate,System.Object)
member.summary: Executes the specified delegate with the specified arguments synchronously on the thread the Dispatcher is associated with.
member.param: A delegate to a method that takes parameters specified in args, which is pushed onto the Dispatcher event queue.
An array of objects to pass as arguments to the given method.
member.returns: The return value from the delegate being invoked or null if the delegate has no return value

member.name: M:Qhta.WPF.Behaviors.DispatcherBridge.Invoke(System.Delegate,System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: Executes the specified delegate with the specified arguments synchronously on the thread the Dispatcher is associated with.
member.param: A delegate to a method that takes parameters specified in args, which is pushed onto the Dispatcher event queue.
Sender object to pass as the first argument to the given method
An array of objects to pass as arguments to the given method.
member.returns: The return value from the delegate being invoked or null if the delegate has no return value

member.name: M:Qhta.WPF.Behaviors.DispatcherBridge.Invoke(System.Action)
member.summary: Executes the specified System.Action synchronously on the thread the Dispatcher is associated with.
member.param: A delegate to invoke through the dispatcher.
